Question: What actions does Amphitryon take against Hercules in *The Legend of Hercules*?
Options:
A. He sends Hercules on a military campaign in Egypt.
B. He engages Hercules in personal combat.
C. He uses his gods-given name to conceal his identity.
D. He attempts to eliminate Hercules.
Answer: A) He sends Hercules on a military campaign in Egypt., B) He engages Hercules in personal combat., D) He attempts to eliminate Hercules.
